title: Project-Based Learning (PjBL) Design Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic instructional design principles and social sector expertise
context.additional_context: A short-term program for learners over 40 aiming to master PjBL (Project-Based Learning) design methodologies in mobile learning environments using digital devices. It focuses on addressing practical project problems based on real-world social field experience and fostering collaborative learning environments.

learning_goals: Create a social domain project design document applying PjBL core principles (problem definition, learner motivation, autonomy support)
Propose three or more step-by-step PjBL activity sequences optimized for mobile environments.
Explain monitoring strategies for PjBL progress using formative assessment tools in large learner groups.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
